note.p: Steward, Lincoln’s Inn, 1860–85. His father, Michael Doyle, had also been steward of Lincoln’s Inn.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1513/6/4), 1871 (RG10/346/26/45, RG10/372/126/[4?]), 1881 (RG11/323/116/14), 1901 (RG13/677/32/16)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 November 2019)
Lincoln’s Inn (Archive catalogue refs. C1a29-31 and C1a32-34)
